messages.title: Building a Stronger economy and a Fairer society
messages.content: Lauren's plan for Brent includes safeguarding services such as libraries and against unfair parking schemes.

messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: Highlights the party's past achievements and future commitments such as protecting education spending, cutting income tax, building new homes, establishing 'rent to own' schemes, and increasing wages for the lowest paid.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect education spending from cradle to grave and extending free childcare.
Cut income tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Building 300,000 new homes and establishing 'rent to own' schemes.
Pledging an extra £1 an hour for the lowest paid.

mentions.candidate: Lauren Keith is highlighted throughout the leaflet with photos and personal commitments.
mentions.tacticalSituation: A bar chart is included showing tactical voting information, implying that voting for Lauren Keith is the best way to beat Labour in Brent Central.

issues.economy: Lauren's plan includes safeguarding local services against unfair parking schemes, which could imply economic management at the local level.
issues.education: Protect education spending from cradle to grave and extending free childcare are mentioned.
issues.socialWelfare: Pledging an extra £1 an hour for the lowest paid suggests a focus on social welfare.

housing.content: Building 300,000 new homes and establishing 'rent to own' schemes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Lauren lives in the area and has campaigned on local issues such as library provision and against scrapping visitor parking scratch cards.

politicalExperience.achievements: Carrying on the legacy of hardworking Liberal Democrat MP Sarah Teather and pledges to continue the open surgery through which Sarah has helped thousands of residents.

contactInformation.address: Brent Central Lib Dems, 3 Walm Lane London NW2 5SJ

images.caption: Lauren with local residents supporting the Save our Six library campaign.
Lauren supporting a fair deal for renters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes strategies to encourage volunteering and participation in Lauren Keith's campaign.
